game.name: Ninja Man
game.description:
Ninja is a favorite character of many game lovers! If you are also the one who is crazy for the ultimate moves of ninja, trying out this brand new arcade challenge can be a nice bet for you. Here a big problem has come in front of your favorite character. His lover has been trapped by a group of enemies and you are the only one to help him out. Do you think that you can assist this brave man to face off the biggest challenges of his life? Join Ninja Man game and get ready to help the brave man to save his lover!

Your objective in this cute physics adventure challenge is to help ninja complete a difficult mission while avoiding the deadly enemies. Try to grab all the stars that you see on the screen to boost your score! Defeat all his enemies, finish all levels and get a chance to become a ninja hero! Use your mouse or tap the screen to move your character and D to attack your enemies! Use the S key to defend your character and space key to jump!

Aim your target using the circle and release your mouse to move your character! Hurry up friends! His cute girlfriend is waiting for him! Try to apply all the vital ninja moves to complete all levels and become a true ninja hero! Our gaming portal features many more top ninja games that are free to play online, no download required. Try out them one by one to add more fun to your excitement and entertainment!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Ninja Man at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE ON SCREEN AND HOLD TO ADJUST THE DIRECTION AND RELEASE TO HIT
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L-CLICK OF MOUSE AND SWIPE TO SELECT THE DIRECTION AND RELEASE TO HIT
